title: NVIDIA Unveils Next-Generation Blackwell GPU Architecture
summary: NVIDIA introduced its Blackwell GPU architecture designed for large-scale AI training and inference, promising higher efficiency and lower cost per token.
author: NVIDIA Newsroom

title: OpenAI Introduces GPT-5 Preview with Improved Reasoning Capabilities
summary: OpenAI announced GPT-5 preview, focusing on reliability, reasoning depth, and multi-step toolchain execution for enterprise workloads.
author: OpenAI

title: Apple Launches M3, M3 Pro, and M3 Max Chips
summary: Apple revealed its M3 family of chips built on a 3nm process, offering substantial GPU improvements and hardware-accelerated ray tracing.
author: Apple Newsroom

title: SpaceX Starship Completes Fully Integrated Flight Test
summary: SpaceX successfully completed a full ascent, reentry, and splashdown test of its Starship launch system, advancing plans for lunar and Mars missions.
author: SpaceX

title: EU Officially Passes the AI Act
summary: The European Union approved the AI Act, creating the worldâ€™s first comprehensive legal framework governing AI use, transparency, and safety.
author: European Parliament
